title: Home
text:
Welcome to the Species & Ecosystem Mapping Hub
This website serves as a central hub for exploring the Species & Ecosystem Mapping Project and the KBA Mapping Project. Use the navigation bar at the top to access each project.
The links under the tabs will take you to the code and the interactive maps, all of which are hosted externally. Each external page includes a button at the top to return to this landing page, so you can easily navigate back
Happy exploring!
